channel.title: Herald-Tribune (Custom RSS - Broad Article Grab)
channel.description: A personal RSS feed with broader article scraping from heraldtribune.com

item.title: Fly away! Breeze adds 19 new routes, including several from Florida
item.description: Sometimes you just need to get away. Even if where you are is where others head to when they want to get away.

item.title: Open kitchen shelves may look great, Marni says, but are they for you?
item.description: I know it’s tempting. You see those clean, uncluttered open shelves in kitchens, with their matching ceramic dishes, beautifully staged glassware, lots of negative space, and you think, “Why not? If my kitchen had open shelving, my belongings would look great, too! Plus, everything would be so easy to reach.”

item.title: Marni's sentimental guide to giving the past a presence in our homes
item.description: Over the years, I have earned the reputation as the stuff police. I am forever nagging you to purge, declutter, toss, donate, edit, dump, oust, clear, lighten up and let go. But today, sit down, I am going to sentimentally suggest that some old things you should keep.

item.title: Remembering Ozzy Osbourne: Where to stream his MTV reality show for free
item.description: Heavy metal legendOzzy Osbourne diedat 76 years old yesterday, about five years after publicly announcing a Parkinson’s disease and emphysema diagnosis.

item.title: Cook Out is coming to Florida. Here's where new locations are opening
item.description: Florida is finally, officially invited to join a 10-state cookout.Cook Out, probably the only fast food restaurant where you can order a quesadilla as a side to your cheeseburger, is expanding to the Sunshine State after 36 years of service andmore than 350 locationsthroughout the southeast.

item.title: Is your electric bill high? These tips could save you…
item.description: Summer is here with a vengeance. Florida is just now coming out from under a heat dome that saw broiling heat and high heat index values across the state, butAugust is traditionally the hottest monthfor the Sunshine State so there's more hot weather coming.

item.title: Trump Blvd., Trump Mobile, First Lady Melania Trump…
item.description: When PresidentDonald Trump and first lady Melania Trumpvisited theKennedy Centerlast month to watch “Les Miserables,” part of thecrowd booedwhen they stood up.

item.title: VOTE for Sarasota-Manatee's all-time best state…
item.description: The Herald-Tribune has gone back and documented the area volleyball teams that have won state championships.

item.title: UNF poll: Casey DeSantis leads Byron Donalds in…
item.description: AUniversity of North Floridapoll released July 24 showsFirst Lady Casey DeSantisleadingU.S. Rep. Byron Donalds32%-29% in a hypothetical matchup for the GOP nomination for governor.

item.title: Sarasota, Manatee real estate market still favoring buyers
item.description: The Sarasota-Bradenton area'sreal estate market continued its slowdownin June, according to themost recent industry report.
